Class DdapAuthorizeAttribute

Namespace
Ddap.Auth.Attributes
Assembly
Ddap.Auth.dll

Authorization attribute for decorating DDAP controllers with policy-based authorization. Simplifies applying DDAP authorization policies to controller actions.

[AttributeUsage(AttributeTargets.Class|AttributeTargets.Method, AllowMultiple = true, Inherited = true)]
public class DdapAuthorizeAttribute : AuthorizeAttribute, IAuthorizeData

Examples

[DdapAuthorize(DdapAuthorizationPolicies.Read)]
public async Task<IActionResult> GetEntity(string id)
{
    // Only users with read permission can access
}

[DdapAuthorize(DdapAuthorizationPolicies.Write)]
public async Task<IActionResult> UpdateEntity(string id, EntityData data)
{
    // Only users with write permission can access
}

[DdapAuthorize(DdapAuthorizationPolicies.Admin)]
public async Task<IActionResult> DeleteEntity(string id)
{
    // Only users with admin permission can access
}

Constructors

DdapAuthorizeAttribute(string)

Initializes a new instance of the DdapAuthorizeAttribute class.

public DdapAuthorizeAttribute(string policy)

Parameters

policy string

The authorization policy name to apply.
